10namespace stdui {
11
12#define ATTR(PROP) \
13auto &PROP(typeof(props_t::PROP)& _##PROP) { \
14 props.PROP = _##PROP; \
15 return *this; \
16} \
17auto &PROP(typeof(props_t::PROP)&& _##PROP) {\
18 props.PROP = _##PROP; \
19 return *this; \
20}
21
22 namespace layout {
23 COMPONENT(Flow, ;
24 enum class Direction {
25 HORIZONTAL,
26 VERTICAL,
27 };
28
29 struct props_t {
30 Direction dir;
31 cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t spacing = 0;
32 };
33 ATTR(dir)
34 ATTR(spacing)
35 ) {
36
37 void horizontal_fixed_width() {
38 std::unordered_set<cydui::dimensions::dimension_t*> deps {};
39 deps.insert(&attrs->_w);
40 auto chi = $children();
41
42 for (auto &child: chi) {
43 deps.insert(&child->attrs()->_w);
44 }
45 for (auto &child: chi) {
46 auto ats = child->attrs();
47 ats->h($ch());
48 ats->x(cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t {[=, this]() {
49 int total_w = 0;
50 for (const auto &dim: deps) {
51 if (dim != &attrs->_w) { // avoid summing the container's width
52 total_w += dim->val();
53 }
54 }
55 int spacing = std::max(0, $cw().val() - total_w) / ((int) deps.size() - 1);
56
57 int res = 0;
58 for (const auto &dim: deps) {
59 res += dim->val() + spacing;
60 }
61 return res;
62 }, deps});
63 }
64 }
65 void vertical_fixed_height() {
66 std::unordered_set<cydui::dimensions::dimension_t*> deps {};
67 deps.insert(&attrs->_h);
68 auto chi = $children();
69
70 for (auto &child: chi) {
71 deps.insert(&child->attrs()->_h);
72 }
73 for (auto &child: chi) {
74 auto ats = child->attrs();
75 ats->w($cw());
76 ats->y(cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t {[=, this]() {
77 int total_h = 0;
78 for (const auto &dim: deps) {
79 if (dim != &attrs->_h) { // avoid summing the container's width
80 total_h += dim->val();
81 }
82 }
83 int spacing = std::max(0, $ch().val() - total_h) / ((int) deps.size() - 1);
84
85 int res = 0;
86 for (const auto &dim: deps) {
87 res += dim->val() + spacing;
88 }
89 return res;
90 }, deps});
91 }
92 }
93 void horizontal_free_width() {
94 auto* spacing = new cydui::dimensions::dimension_t {props->spacing};
95 std::unordered_set<cydui::dimensions::dimension_t*> deps {};
96 deps.insert(spacing);
97 auto chi = $children();
98 for (auto &child: chi) {
99 auto ats = child->attrs();
100 ats->h($ch());
101 ats->x(cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t {[=, this]() {
102 int res = 0;
103 for (const auto &dim: deps) {
104 res += dim->val() + spacing->val();
105 }
106 return res;
107 }, deps});
108
109 deps.insert(&child->attrs()->_w);
110 }
111 }
112 void vertical_free_height() {
113 auto* spacing = new cydui::dimensions::dimension_t {props->spacing};
114 std::unordered_set<cydui::dimensions::dimension_t*> deps {};
115 deps.insert(spacing);
116 auto chi = $children();
117 for (auto &child: chi) {
118 auto ats = child->attrs();
119 ats->w($cw());
120 ats->y(cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t {[=, this]() {
121 int res = 0;
122 for (const auto &dim: deps) {
123 res += dim->val() + spacing->val();
124 }
125 return res;
126 }, deps});
127
128 deps.insert(&child->attrs()->_h);
129 }
130 }
131
132 ON_REDRAW {
133 switch (props->dir) {
134 case Flow::Direction::HORIZONTAL:
135 if (attrs->_w_has_changed) {
136 horizontal_fixed_width();
137 } else {
138 horizontal_free_width();
139 }
140 break;
141 case Flow::Direction::VERTICAL:
142 if (attrs->_h_has_changed) {
143 vertical_fixed_height();
144 } else {
145 vertical_free_height();
146 }
147 break;
148 }
149
150 return {};
151 }
152 };
153
154 STATE(Grid) {
155 std::unordered_map<cydui::components::component_base_t*, std::pair<int, int>> positions {};
156 std::unordered_map<cydui::components::component_base_t*, std::pair<int, int>> sizes {};
157 };
158 COMPONENT(Grid, {
159 unsigned int rows;
160 unsigned int cols;
161 int x_gap = 0;
162 int y_gap = 0;
163 }; ATTR(rows) ATTR(cols) ATTR(x_gap) ATTR(y_gap)) {
164 ON_REDRAW {
165 state->positions.clear();
166 state->sizes.clear();
167 auto chi = $children();
168 std::unordered_set<cydui::dimensions::dimension_t*> deps {};
169 deps.insert(&attrs->_w);
170 deps.insert(&attrs->_h);
171
172 for (auto &child: chi) {
173 auto ats = child->attrs();
174 state->positions[child] = {ats->_x, ats->_y};
175 state->sizes[child] = {ats->_w, ats->_h};
176
177 ats->x(cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t {[=, this]() {
178 auto [grid_x, _] = state->positions[child];
179 int total_w = attrs->_w;
180 int step = total_w / (int) props->cols;
181 return grid_x * step + (props->x_gap / 2);
182 }, deps});
183 ats->y(cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t {[=, this]() {
184 auto [_, grid_y] = state->positions[child];
185 int total_h = attrs->_h;
186 int step = total_h / (int) props->rows;
187 return grid_y * step + (props->y_gap / 2);
188 }, deps});
189 ats->w(cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t {[=, this]() {
190 auto [grid_w, _] = state->sizes[child];
191 int total_w = attrs->_w;
192 int step = total_w / (int) props->cols;
193 return grid_w * step - props->x_gap;
194 }, deps});
195 ats->h(cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t {[=, this]() {
196 auto [_, grid_h] = state->sizes[child];
197 int total_h = attrs->_h;
198 int step = total_h / (int) props->rows;
199 return grid_h * step - props->y_gap;
200 }, deps});
201 }
202 return {};
203 }
204 };
205 }
